verses.name: 1 Kings 21:8
verses.text: So she wrote letters in Ahab’s name, and sealed them with his seal, and sent the letters unto the elders and to the nobles that were in his city, dwelling with Naboth.

verses.name: 1 Kings 21:9
verses.text: And she wrote in the letters, saying, Proclaim a fast, and set Naboth on high among the people:

verses.name: 1 Kings 21:10
verses.text: And set two men, sons of Belial, before him, to bear witness against him, saying, Thou didst blaspheme God and the king. And then carry him out, and stone him, that he may die.
